definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:Kisame</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:ChakraAmount</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:ChakraAmount</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><mutation has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><mutation has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
